title: President condemns attack on police office in Karachi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 17 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Friday strongly condemned the terror attack on the police office in Karachi.In a statement, he prayed for the early recovery of the injured.He said the whole nation stood with the security forces in the fight against terrorism.Efforts would continue till the complete elimination of the menace of terrorism, he added.
